name: Drymir Cave under Richmordnom
description:
A small story, the usual war, in the role you play. He went in search of the dark force that was destroying his village. He decided to find and destroy this place once and for all. But will he be able to do it?
Cave under Richmordnom - is a hardcore indie project and RPG elements and a third-person view. You have to go through an interesting story with a variety of levels, traps and secrets.
